price: Alif Laam Raa [319]. Izi ni Aayah z’Igitabu, ico Gitabu kikaba ari yo Qor’ani itomoye neza, mu nsiguro, mu ngingo z’ibirekuwe n’ibizira, ikaba inatomoye neza kandi no mu burongozi bwayo.
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
footnotes: [319] Raba insiguro y’indome zitangura mu ntango y’igisomwa Al-Baqara.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
